News.Title: Worth Peripherals Q3FY26 Results Show Strong Growth
News.Summary: Worth Peripherals reported Q3FY26 standalone revenue of ₹5,188.18 lakhs with net profit of ₹436.50 lakhs. Consolidated revenue reached ₹7,508.74 lakhs for the quarter ended December 31, 2025.

News.Title: Worth Peripherals Appoints New Company Secretary
News.Summary: Worth Peripherals Limited announces resignation of Nidhi Arjariya as Company Secretary and appointment of Tushar Batham as replacement, effective December 15, 2025.

News.Title: Worth Peripherals Reports Strong Q2 Performance with 11% Revenue Growth
News.Summary: Worth Peripherals Limited announced its quarterly results for the quarter ended September 30, 2025. The company reported standalone revenue from operations of ₹5,342.26 lakhs compared to ₹4,921.05 lakhs in the same quarter last year, representing growth of approximately 8.6%. Profit after tax increased to ₹463.20 lakhs from ₹305.71 lakhs year-over-year. For the half-year period, revenue reached ₹10,554.89 lakhs versus ₹9,975.06 lakhs in the previous year. The company's consolidated results showed revenue of ₹7,767.67 lakhs for the quarter. Earnings per share stood at ₹2.94 for the quarter compared to ₹1.94 in the corresponding quarter last year. The Board of Directors approved these unaudited financial results in their meeting held on November 6, 2025. The company operates primarily in manufacturing and sale of corrugated boxes.
